articles.headline: Biden Denies Tara Reade’s Assault Allegation: ‘It Never Happened’
articles.snippet: Joseph R. Biden Jr., in his first public address of a former Senate aide’s accusation that he sexually assaulted her in 1993, called on the National Archives to release any document related to the allegation.
articles.abstract: Joseph R. Biden Jr., in his first public address of a former Senate aide’s accusation that he sexually assaulted her in 1993, called on the National Archives to release any document related to the allegation.
articles.lead_paragraph: Former Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. on Friday denied an allegation of sexual assault by a former Senate aide, Tara Reade, breaking a monthlong silence that had frustrated some Democratic activists as his presidential campaign navigated issues of gender that are vitally important to many members of his party.
articles.byline: By Katie Glueck, Lisa Lerer and Sydney Ember

articles.headline: ‘This Feels Very Different’
articles.snippet: For over a decade, the Permian Basin has been the epicenter of the American oil boom. Now, it’s the epicenter of its demise.
articles.abstract: For over a decade, the Permian Basin has been the epicenter of the American oil boom. Now, it’s the epicenter of its demise.
articles.lead_paragraph: MIDLAND, Texas — In just over a month, scores of drilling rigs have been dismantled and tucked away in storage yards. Pump jacks, those piston pumps that lift crude out of the ground, have seesawed to a standstill as operators shut down wells.
articles.byline: By Tamir Kalifa and Clifford Krauss

articles.headline: The Business of Burps: Scientists Smell Profit in Cow Emissions
articles.snippet: Cattle produce more methane than many large countries. A solution could be an ecological and financial breakthrough — and a Swiss biotech company may be on the cusp.
articles.abstract: Cattle produce more methane than many large countries. A solution could be an ecological and financial breakthrough — and a Swiss biotech company may be on the cusp.
articles.lead_paragraph: LANCASTER, England — Peaches, a brown-and-white Jersey cow weighing 1,200 pounds, was amiably following Edward Towers through a barn on a sunny March morning when the 6-year-old dug in her front hooves.

articles.headline: Congress Calls on Jeff Bezos of Amazon to Testify
articles.snippet: Lawmakers want to question Mr. Bezos, Amazon’s chief executive, as part of its antitrust investigation.
articles.abstract: Lawmakers want to question Mr. Bezos, Amazon’s chief executive, as part of its antitrust investigation.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The House Judiciary Committee on Friday called on Jeff Bezos, Amazon’s chief executive, to testify before Congress, in a major escalation of its investigation into the country’s largest technology companies.
